about_the_game:
Escape the metropolis and embrace a new life in the frontier village of Ravenwood Acres!

Ravenwood Acres is A Farming Lifestyle RPG inspired by Stardew Valley and Fantasy Life with multiple paths for the player to explore, each with their own storyline and mechanics that build out the world.

You play as the first new person to arrive in the frontier town of Ravenwood in years; given a parcel of land by the town’s mayor, your life is at your fingertips. Will you train to become a legendary crafter, brave the wilderness as an adventurer, or live a quiet life on the farm?

Be your authentic self while establishing the homestead of your dreams. Customize your home to fit the lifestyle you choose to live.
*Will you grow crops and care for animals?
*Will you tend an herb garden and nurture sprites?
*How about creating a sparring yard and quarry to outfit yourself?

Every choice you make will help you live the life you want to while restoring the town to its original glory. Grow alongside the vibrant collection of villagers who call Ravenwood their home, with over 50 people to meet and befriend. Who knows, you may even meet the love of your life!

Farm, Explore, Fight, Craft, Gather, Customize, and Grow. Your life and what you do is what you make of it!

Features

Create your Homestead:
Take your land and transform it into a space truly built to support you. You decide what structures to make, what to grow, and what creatures come to live with you. Design your homestead to support you by placing structures and decorations that make your life easier where you want with our decorator tool. From Barns & Coops, Quarries & Herb Gardens, to Beehives & a Hot Spring. Your land is ready to become a home.

Explore interactive crafting systems:
Train under Master Crafters to increase your skills and unlock new items, creatures, and abilities. Become a legend in one skill or master them all; the choice is yours, and your story is not yet written. Engage in interactive minigames for crafting, increasing the quality of the items crafted. Master the minigames to reduce resource costs and increase production.

Be your authentic self:
Customize yourself by selecting from various physiques, starting styles, and accessories. If the starter clothing isn't enough, head over to the tailor. Finnian believes self-expression through fashion is the window for the soul to shine through! Get something that helps you shine, or learn to make it alongside him.

Robust Farming Systems
All the traditional features expected of the genre, including buying and producing seeds, fertilization, planting, harvesting, raising animals, fishing, cooking, and refining animal products.

Delve Roguelike Dungeons using Various Combat Styles and Abilities
Delve into dungeons and clear out the corruption with our action combat system. Become a Knight, a Ranger, a Mage, or a Monster Tamer. Master your skills and abilities while uncovering what is corrupting the woods around your little town.

Tame Monsters to Assist on Your Homestead
Cleanse the corruption from monsters and recruit them to assist around the farm. Some produce resources, while others can automate tasks for you around the farm, like watering or gathering ore.

Life is better with friends:
Meet over 50+ characters who have chosen to make the frontier their home. While it's a hard life, it's made easier by a loving community. Quickly become a member by talking to them and learning more about what makes them unique.

NPCs and Narratives
Fully fledged NPCs with dialogue and cutscenes, even some with storylines that progress. Find a romantic partner to help out around the homestead, unlocking additional cutscenes & dialogue for married life.

Customize the Town and Bring in New Villagers:
Revitalize your town by inviting new villagers to move to town, driving up interest by improving the town, and placing Ravenwood on the map. Select from interested applicants, decide where to place their home, and customize the area around them and the town itself. Turn your town into your perfect slice of the world.

Love is in the air:
Meet the singles who call Ravenwood their home. Build relationships, uncover the keys to their hearts, and find your other half.
